MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 6:29PM in the LL59 postcode area of Menai Bridge following water ingress to a damaged undrground cable . This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers have arrived on site and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:46PM on 27th January 2021
